shellshocker

Class Flamethrower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Point2D
      • java.awt.Point
        • shellshocker.Flamethrower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Rotatable

    public class Flamethrower
extends java.awt.Point
implements Rotatable
    Creates a flamethrower weapon that the user-controlled character can use to damage enemy objects. The flamethrower has attributes of location, size, and rotation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
